rules_text:
When this creature enters, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a Human card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
Human spells you cast cost {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} less to cast. This effect reduces only the amount of colored mana you pay.
